name: Shrimp Rémoulade
recipeIngredient: * cup chopped scallions, including 2 to 3 inches of the green tops

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together the mustard, paprika, cayenne and 11/2 teaspoons salt in a deep bowl. Beat in the vinegar. Whisking constantly, pour in the oil in a slow, thin stream and beat until smooth and thick. Add the scallions, celery and parsley and mix well. Cover tightly with plastic wrap and let rest at room temperature for at least 4 hours.

Shell and devein the shrimp. Rinse them under cold water. Bring 2 quarts of water to a simmer in a large pot. Add the remaining salt. Drop in the shrimp and cook, uncovered, for 3 to 5 minutes, until pink and firm. Drain, let cool, then chill until ready to serve.
Mound the shredded lettuce on individual chilled plates. Arrange the shrimp on top, spoon some of the sauce over them -- reserving the rest for another use -- and serve immediately.
